name: Razz
descriptions: Private Razz is an NCR soldier and part of the Misfits living in Camp Golf in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281.

Razz was born in slums of the Boneyard and got out the first chance he got, leaving his family behind. He joined the Fiends in the Mojave for a time, but joined the New California Republic Army later since Fiends tend to not last long when the NCR are around; in his words, he joined because "at least this way the badasses with the top-shelf guns" would be on his side.
He was once addicted to Psycho, but has since kicked the habit.
He has a rotten attitude for pretty much everything, like how the NCR Rangers get to stay in the resort, while the grunts have to live in tents.
Razz was written by area designer Travis Stout, who also wrote the rest of the Misfits.

topics.response_text: Okay, okay, I admit it - knowing how to use these guns right is pretty cool.
Hoo-hoo! Hot damn, it's gonna be a party in the camp tonight!

topics.topic_text: Why are you in the Army?
topics.response_text: Shit, man, it was this or the Fiends, and Fiends don't last too long in the NCR.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me anything about Camp Golf?
topics.response_text: What you want to know? Whole place used to be some kinda rich bastard resort, back before the war.
Ain't much to tell. Grew up out west, in the Boneyard. Heard of it?
We don't talk too much, mostly. Poindexter's a smartass prick.

topics.topic_text: That's charming. It's good to know team-building is alive and well.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Hey, you asked. Don't want the answer, don't ask a guy's opinion.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like a bunch of winners.
topics.response_text: Whatever. Not like I need any of them. I do just fine on my own.
Psycho! The big red one! I used to run with the Fiends, I still got the hookups. Smuggle some in and you'll see an improvement.

topics.topic_text: Okay, tell me where to get it.
topics.response_text: My man Jack at Red Rock Canyon got the goods. But listen: once you get folks dosed on Psycho, ain't a lot of room for much else.

topics.topic_text: I'm convinced this is a good idea, let's do it.
topics.response_text: Right. Head to Red Rock Canyon - that's deep Khan territory, so watch your back. Talk to Jack, tell him Razz wants the usual. See you soon.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I'll talk to the others first.
